name: Onyx
description: Turn your portfolio into a living desktop where every click reveals something new.
fullDescription: Onyx reimagines the personal website as a Windows-inspired workspace you can actually explore. Launch apps, drag windows, peek at projects, and feel like you're sitting at a futuristic desk that just happens to be your portfolio. It is fast, responsive, accessible, and brimming with playful details that invite you to stay awhile.

name: StudyBuddy: AI Learning Suite
description: Summon an AI study partner that understands your lectures better than your group chat.
fullDescription: StudyBuddy stitches lecture slides, notes, and textbooks into a personalized learning companion. Ask it anything, get context-rich answers from a roster of HuggingFace transformers, and glide through assignments with intent-aware study flows. The lightweight web app runs on a Flask backbone, so you can plug in new models and features without breaking focus.

name: AI-Powered Question and Answer Tool
description: Drop in a document and get a sharp, GPT-4 powered librarian on demand.
fullDescription: Upload PDFs, policies, or manuals and watch this RAG tool spin them into instant answers. GPT-4 handles the conversation while custom embeddings keep every response grounded in your source material. With Streamlit for the UI and Docker for deployment, it's the fastest way to stand up a trustworthy knowledge bot.

name: 5-Stage Pipelined Processor Design
description: Push a custom MIPS-like CPU to 5.8x speedups and see the pipeline come alive.
fullDescription: Experience a five-stage processor that refuses to stall. This project reworks a classic MIPS design with microcode controllers, smart hazard detection, and aggressive forwarding, turning textbook diagrams into a blazing-fast implementation. Perfect for anyone who loves seeing theory flex real performance gains.

name: Dungeon Crawler Android Game
description: Delve into a handcrafted Android dungeon crawler with enemies that actually think.
fullDescription: Swipe, slash, and strategize your way through a rogue-lite adventure built natively for Android. Modular enemy AI keeps encounters fresh, MVVM keeps gameplay silky smooth, and every run pushes you to chase the leaderboard. It's the perfect mix of old-school challenge and modern polish.

name: SmartCare.ai
description: Give clinicians an AI command center that triages data before they even open the chart.
fullDescription: SmartCare.ai blends Google Gemini parsing with a PyCaret intelligence layer to spotlight the trends that matter most in patient records. Synthetic C-CDA histories, predictive alerts, and cinematic dashboards transform raw paperwork into guided care decisions. Built on Next.js and MongoDB, the experience deploys seamlessly on Vercel for hackathon-ready heroics.
